p: A total of 300 sera tested positive through ELISA for IgG antibodies to DENV. This consisted of 174, 77 and 49 sera from Ngazidja, Mwali and Ndzouani, corresponding to 88.8%, 66.4% and 55.7% seropositivity rates, respectively. The difference in seropositivity according to island was highly significant (p<0.0001).
